Description :
The young ruler Iolka Jason announced the impending wedding. That's only the ceremony the bride was killed by a poisoned arrow! Beside himself with grief, Jason decided to go on a journey, the likes of which had not yet been born, and get the golden fleece. With the help of a magical artifact he expects to return the favorite of the dark kingdom of shadows. But the campaign will succeed only if Jason to join the other illustrious heroes! Famous game for the first time is completely in Russian. You will lead a squad of the best warriors of Greece aboard the legendary ship "Argo". His fearless crew explores the oceans, will visit the city and the islands of the Aegean Sea, a journey through the jungle and forest thickets. Unique armor and weapons, walked out of the forge of Hephaestus himself, you do battle with mythical beasts and characters of legends. Your choice - a huge number of deadly skills, combos and finishing techniques. Role-playing, sound, and no less important than the ability to watch swing a sword. Immerse yourself in the heart of fierce battles, following the familiar story of myths of Ancient Greece!
